scripts.secrets:set: flyctl secrets set SPREADSHEET_ID=$(op read op://Prod/lrh-signature-server/sheet-id) GOOGLE_CREDENTIALS_JSON=$(op read op://Prod/lrh-signature-server/google-credentials-json) GOOGLE_API_POLL_INTERVAL=1000 --app lrh-signature-server
scripts.dev: SPREADSHEET_ID=$(op read op://Prod/lrh-signature-server/sheet-id) GOOGLE_CREDENTIALS_JSON=$(op read op://Prod/lrh-signature-server/google-credentials-json) GOOGLE_API_POLL_INTERVAL=1000 node index.js
